Quickstrike:



Quickstrike was getting bored, and with that soon, his new pacing 
habit was going to return. He wasn't given any news, so that meant he 
could take out his own personal task. 

He walked to Black Arachnia's location, staying by the 
threshold. "Ah'm gonna deal wit' th' rat. Ya know anyone who wants t' 
join?" he said with an evil grin.
